languages.text: {n}Смиренно и торжественно аколиты подносят варп-двигателю одну очищенную инфокрипту за другой, повторяя слова прославляющих молитв. Свершив помазание контактов священной смазкой, Паскаль сменяет их в слотах когитатора. От смрадных клубов дыма из священных курильниц и потери крови, продолжающей питать кибергоргулью, у вас начинает кружиться голова и плыть все перед глазами.{/n}

{n}In meek solemnity, the acolytes offer up the cleansed data-crypts to the warp engine one after another, repeating prayers of exaltation. After anointing the contacts with sacred unguents, Pasqal inserts them in the cogitator's slots. Your head begins to spin from the holy censers' foul-smelling clouds of smoke and from the loss of the blood that the cybergargoyle continues to drink from you, and the world swims before your eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Смиренно и торжественно аколиты подносят варп-двигателю одну очищенную инфокрипту за другой, повторяя слова прославляющих молитв. Свершив помазание контактов священной смазкой, Паскаль сменяет их в слотах когитатора. От смрадных клубов дыма из священных курильниц и потери крови, продолжающей питать кибергоргулью, у вас начинает кружиться голова и плыть все перед глазами.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在庄严的气氛中，侍仆们顺从地照做着，一个接一个地向亚空间引擎献上经过净化的数据密存器，口中不断颂唱着赞美的祈祷。帕斯卡将神圣机油涂抹在这些加密装置上，之后将它们插进了沉思者的插槽。恶臭的烟雾从神圣的香炉中升腾而起，电子滴水嘴兽不断地吸吮着你的鲜血，你感觉眼前的世界开始天旋地转。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In meek solemnity, the acolytes offer up the cleansed data-crypts to the warp engine one after another, repeating prayers of exaltation. After anointing the contacts with sacred unguents, Pasqal inserts them in the cogitator's slots. Your head begins to spin from the holy censers' foul-smelling clouds of smoke and from the loss of the blood that the cybergargoyle continues to drink from you, and the world swims before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在庄严的气氛中，侍仆们顺从地照做着，一个接一个地向亚空间引擎献上经过净化的数据加密装置，口中不断颂唱着赞美的祈祷。帕斯卡将神圣机油涂抹在这些加密装置上，之后将它们插进了思考器的插槽。恶臭的烟雾从神圣的香炉中升腾而起，电子滴水嘴兽不断地吸吮着你的鲜血，你感觉眼前的世界开始天旋地转。{/n}

languages.text: {n}荘厳な雰囲気の中、アコライトたちは浄化されたデータ・クリプトを次々とワープエンジンに捧げ、高揚の祈りを繰り返した。パスカルは聖なる軟膏で接点を塗り、考算機のスロットに挿入する。聖なる香炉の放つ臭い煙と、サイバーガーゴイルに飲まれ続ける血の喪失で頭がクラクラし、目の前の世界が揺らいでいく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In meek solemnity, the acolytes offer up the cleansed data-crypts to the warp engine one after another, repeating prayers of exaltation. After anointing the contacts with sacred unguents, Pasqal inserts them in the cogitator's slots. Your head begins to spin from the holy censers' foul-smelling clouds of smoke and from the loss of the blood that the cybergargoyle continues to drink from you, and the world swims before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}荘厳な雰囲気の中、アコライトたちは浄化されたデータ・クリプトを次々とワープエンジンに捧げ、高揚の祈りを繰り返した。聖なる軟膏がパスカルの手により、考算機のスロットに挿入される。聖なる香炉の放つ煙と、サイバーガーゴイルに飲まれ続ける血の喪失で頭がクラクラし、目の前の世界が揺らいでいく。{/n}
{n}荘厳な雰囲気の中、アコライトたちは浄化されたデータ・クリプトを次々とワープエンジンに捧げ、高揚の祈りを繰り返した。パスカルは聖なる軟膏で接点を塗り、考算機のスロットに挿入する。聖なる香炉の放つ臭い煙と、サイバーガーゴイルに飲まれ続ける血の喪失で頭がクラクラし、目の前の世界が揺らいでいく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}In demütiger Feierlichkeit opfern die Akolythen die gereinigten Daten-Krypten der Reihe nach dem Warp-Triebwerk und wiederholen dabei erhebende Gebete. Nachdem Pasqal die Kontakte mit heiligem Balsam gesalbt hat, steckt er sie in die Buchsen des Cogitators. Dir wird schwindelig von den übel riechenden Rauchwolken der heiligen Rauchgefäße und von dem Blutverlust, den die Cybergargoyle weiterhin bei dir verursacht, und die Welt verschwimmt vor deinen Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In meek solemnity, the acolytes offer up the cleansed data-crypts to the warp engine one after another, repeating prayers of exaltation. After anointing the contacts with sacred unguents, Pasqal inserts them in the cogitator's slots. Your head begins to spin from the holy censers' foul-smelling clouds of smoke and from the loss of the blood that the cybergargoyle continues to drink from you, and the world swims before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In demütiger Feierlichkeit opfern die Akolythen die gereinigten Daten-Krypten der Reihe nach dem Warp-Triebwerk und wiederholen dabei erhebende Gebete. Nachdem Pasqal die Kontakte mit heiligem Balsam gesalbt hat, steckt er sie in die Buchsen des Cogitators. Dir wird schwindelig von den übel riechenden Rauchwolken der heiligen Rauchgefäße und von dem Blutverlust, den die Cybergargoyle weiterhin bei dir verursacht, und die Welt verschwimmt vor deinen Augen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avec humilité et solennité, les acolytes offrent les uns après les autres les cryptes de données purifiées au moteur Warp en récitant des prières exaltées. Après l'onction des contacteurs à l'aide d'onguents sacrés, Pasqal les insère dans les prises du cogitateur. À cause des volutes de fumée nauséabondes des encensoirs sacrés et de la perte du sang que la cybergargouille continue de vous ponctionner, votre tête commence à tourner, et le monde vacille devant vos yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In meek solemnity, the acolytes offer up the cleansed data-crypts to the warp engine one after another, repeating prayers of exaltation. After anointing the contacts with sacred unguents, Pasqal inserts them in the cogitator's slots. Your head begins to spin from the holy censers' foul-smelling clouds of smoke and from the loss of the blood that the cybergargoyle continues to drink from you, and the world swims before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec humilité et solennité, les acolytes offrent les uns après les autres les cryptes de données purifiées au moteur Warp en récitant des prières exaltées. Après l'onction des contacteurs à l'aide d'onguents sacrés, Pasqal les insère dans les prises du cogitateur. À cause des volutes de fumée nauséabondes des encensoirs sacrés et de la perte du sang que la cybergargouille continue de vous ponctionner, votre tête commence à tourner, et le monde vacille devant vos yeux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En humilde solemnidad, los acólitos ofrecen las criptas de datos purificadas al motor de disformidad una tras otra, sin cesar de recitar oraciones de exaltación. Tras ungir los contactos con los ungüentos sagrados, Pasqal los inserta en las ranuras del cogitador. Con el hediondo humo de los incensarios sacros y la sangre que la cibergárgola te sigue extrayendo, la cabeza te empieza a dar vueltas. El mundo se desliza ante tus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In meek solemnity, the acolytes offer up the cleansed data-crypts to the warp engine one after another, repeating prayers of exaltation. After anointing the contacts with sacred unguents, Pasqal inserts them in the cogitator's slots. Your head begins to spin from the holy censers' foul-smelling clouds of smoke and from the loss of the blood that the cybergargoyle continues to drink from you, and the world swims before your eyes.{/n}

Tras ungir los contactos con los ungüentos sagrados, Pasqal los inserta en las ranuras del cogitador. Con el hediondo humo de los incensarios sacros y la sangre que la cibergárgola te sigue extrayendo, la cabeza te empieza a dar vueltas. El mundo se desliza ante tus ojos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Havariler, uysal bir ciddiyetle temiz veri mahzenlerini öteboyut motoruna bir bir sunuyor, ona yüceltici dualar sarf ediyorlar. Pasqal, kontaklara kutsal özyağ sürdükten sonra onları kavramsayarın yuvalarına yerleştiriyor. Kutsal buhurdanların yükselen berbat kokulu duman bulutları, sibergargoylun lıkır lıkır içmesinden kaynaklanan kan kaybıyla birleşince başın dönmeye ve dünya gözlerinin önünde dalgalanmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In meek solemnity, the acolytes offer up the cleansed data-crypts to the warp engine one after another, repeating prayers of exaltation. After anointing the contacts with sacred unguents, Pasqal inserts them in the cogitator's slots. Your head begins to spin from the holy censers' foul-smelling clouds of smoke and from the loss of the blood that the cybergargoyle continues to drink from you, and the world swims before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Havariler, mütevazı bir ciddiyetle temizlenmiş veri mahzenlerini öteboyut motoruna bir bir sunuyor, ona yüceltici dualar sarf ediyorlar. Pasqal lenslere kutsal merhemleri sürdükten sonra onları kavramsayarın slotlarına yerleştiriyor. Kutsal tütsülüklerden yükselen kötü kokulu duman bulutları ve sibergargoylun içtiği kanın yaşattığı kan kaybı nedeniyle başın dönmeye ve dünya gözlerinin önünde dalgalanmaya başlıyor.{/n}
